mapper.select: /* DaySaleMrpizzaMapper.getDaySaleMrpizzaDtlList */ SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tssh.SALE_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS SALE_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tssh.SALE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'DY') AS YOIL , tssh.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tssh.POS_NO , tssh.BILL_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tooh.ORDER_END_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ORDER_END_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tooh.BILL_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BILL_DT , tssh.DLVR_ORDER_FG , tssh.SALE_FG , tsshp.PAY_FG , tsshp.PAY_CD , tsshp.PAY_NM , tsshp.LINE_NO , tsshp.LINE_SEQ_NO , CASE WHEN tsshp.PAY_FG = 'PAY' AND tsshp.PAY_CD = '01' THEN tsshp.ACQUIRE_NM WHEN tsshp.PAY_FG = 'PAY' AND tsshp.PAY_CD = '18' THEN tcn.NMCODE_NM ELSE '' END AS ACQUIRE_NM , tssh.ORG_BILL_NO , tsshp.PAY_AMT AS TOT_SALE_AMT , CASE WHEN tsshp.PAY_FG = 'PAY' THEN tsshp.PAY_AMT ELSE 0 END AS REAL_SALE_AMT , CASE WHEN tsshp.PAY_FG = 'PAY' AND tsshp.PAY_CD = '01' THEN tsshp.PAY_AMT ELSE 0 END AS PAY01 , CASE WHEN tsshp.PAY_FG = 'PAY' AND tsshp.PAY_CD = '02' THEN tsshp.PAY_AMT ELSE 0 END AS PAY02 , CASE WHEN tsshp.PAY_FG = 'PAY' AND tsshp.PAY_CD = '18' THEN tsshp.PAY_AMT ELSE 0 END AS PAY18 , CASE WHEN tsshp.PAY_FG = 'PAY' AND tsshp.PAY_CD != '01'AND tsshp.PAY_CD != '02'AND tsshp.PAY_CD != '18' THEN tsshp.PAY_AMT ELSE 0 END AS TOT_ETC_PAY_AMT , CASE WHEN tsshp.PAY_FG = 'DC' AND tsshp.PAY_CD != '05' THEN tsshp.PAY_AMT ELSE 0 END AS DC_AMT , CASE WHEN tsshp.PAY_FG = 'DC' AND tsshp.PAY_CD = '05' THEN tsshp.PAY_AMT ELSE 0 END AS DC_SERVICE_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR tssh , TB_MS_STORE tms , ( SELECT A.HQ_OFFICE_CD , A.HQ_BRAND_CD , A.STORE_CD , A.SALE_DATE , A.POS_NO , A.BILL_NO , A.LINE_NO , A.LINE_SEQ_NO , A.ACQUIRE_NM , A.PAY_CD , A.PAY_AMT , A.PAY_FG , A.PAY_NM FROM ( SELECT A.HQ_OFFICE_CD , A.HQ_BRAND_CD , A.STORE_CD , A.SALE_DATE , A.POS_NO , A.BILL_NO , '' AS LINE_NO , '' AS LINE_SEQ_NO , '' AS ACQUIRE_NM , A.PAY_CD AS PAY_CD , A.PAY_AMT AS PAY_AMT , 'PAY' AS PAY_FG , B.NMCODE_NM AS PAY_NM FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_PAY A , (SELECT NMCODE_CD, NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '024') B WHERE A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND A.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND A.SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND A.PAY_CD = B.NMCODE_CD AND A.PAY_CD != '01' UNION SELECT A.HQ_OFFICE_CD , A.HQ_BRAND_CD , A.STORE_CD , A.SALE_DATE , A.POS_NO , A.BILL_NO , A.LINE_NO , A.LINE_SEQ_NO , A.ACQUIRE_NM , '01' AS PAY_CD , A.SALE_AMT AS PAY_AMT , 'PAY' AS PAY_FG , B.NMCODE_NM AS PAY_NM FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_CARD A , (SELECT NMCODE_CD, NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '024') B WHERE A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND A.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND A.SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND '01' = B.NMCODE_CD UNION SELECT A.HQ_OFFICE_CD , A.HQ_BRAND_CD , A.STORE_CD , A.SALE_DATE , A.POS_NO , A.BILL_NO , '' AS LINE_NO , '' AS LINE_SEQ_NO , '' AS ACQUIRE_NM , A.DC_CD AS PAY_CD , A.DC_AMT AS PAY_AMT , 'DC' AS PAY_FG , B.NMCODE_NM AS PAY_NM FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_DC A , (SELECT NMCODE_CD, NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '041') B WHERE A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND A.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND A.SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND A.DC_CD = B.NMCODE_CD ) A ORDER BY A.POS_NO, A.BILL_NO ASC, A.PAY_FG DESC, A.PAY_CD ASC ) tsshp , ( SELECT A.HQ_OFFICE_CD , A.HQ_BRAND_CD , A.STORE_CD , A.SALE_DATE , A.POS_NO , A.BILL_NO , A.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_END_DT -- 주문일시 , A.BILL_DT -- 결제시간 FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR A , TB_OD_ORDER_HDR B WHERE A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND A.SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND A.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND B.STORE_CD (+) = A.STORE_CD AND B.SALE_DATE (+) = A.SALE_DATE AND B.ORDER_NO (+) = A.ORDER_NO ) tooh , TB_SL_SALE_PAY_TEMPORARY tsspt , TB_CM_NMCODE tcn WHERE tssh.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tssh.SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND tssh.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tssh.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tsshp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tssh.HQ_BRAND_CD = tsshp.HQ_BRAND_CD AND tssh.STORE_CD = tsshp.STORE_CD AND tssh.SALE_DATE = tsshp.SALE_DATE AND tssh.POS_NO = tsshp.POS_NO AND tssh.BILL_NO = tsshp.BILL_NO AND tssh.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tssh.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD AND tooh.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= tssh.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tooh.HQ_BRAND_CD (+)= tssh.HQ_BRAND_CD AND tooh.STORE_CD (+)= tssh.STORE_CD AND tooh.SALE_DATE (+)= tssh.SALE_DATE AND tooh.POS_NO (+)= tssh.POS_NO AND tooh.BILL_NO (+)= tssh.BILL_NO AND tsspt.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= tssh.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tsspt.HQ_BRAND_CD (+)= tssh.HQ_BRAND_CD AND tsspt.STORE_CD (+)= tssh.STORE_CD AND tsspt.SALE_DATE (+)= tssh.SALE_DATE AND tsspt.POS_NO (+)= tssh.POS_NO AND tsspt.BILL_NO (+)= tssh.BILL_NO AND tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD (+) = '111' AND tcn.NMCODE_CD (+) = tsspt.TEMPORARY_PAY_CD ORDER BY tssh.SALE_DATE DESC, tssh.STORE_CD, tssh.POS_NO, tssh.BILL_NO ASC, tsshp.PAY_FG DESC, tsshp.PAY_CD, tsshp.LINE_NO, tsshp.LINE_SEQ_NO ASC
